title: AI Recipe Generator
description: An AI-powered recipe generator built using the MERN stack, providing personalized recipe suggestions based on user input.

title: Email Tracker
description: A .NET Core-based email tracking system that allows users to monitor when and where their emails are opened, with SQL database integration for data storage.

title: Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built with React, showcasing projects, skills, and experience in a visually appealing layout.
